title: Settings
subtitle: Adjust rules, access, notification, and security for Learning Journey Loop
learningRulesDesc: Control how training flows for learners
preventJumping: Prevent Learners from Jumping ahead in Required video content
videoCompletion: Percentage that must be watched before a video is marked as completed
minimumScore: Minimum score a learner must achieve to pass
quizAttempts: Number of attempts allowed per quiz
mustPassBeforeProgress: Learners must pass before progressing to subsequent topics
rolesPermissionsDesc: Controls user access across Admin, Instructor, and Viewer roles
selectRole: Select a role to review and adjust permissions:
inviteDeactivate: Invite, deactivate, and update user profiles and roles
createEditContent: Create and edit learning paths, modules, and quizzes
accessDashboards: Access dashboards, reports, and completion metrics
triggerReminders: Trigger manual and automated training reminders
notificationRulesDesc: Controls automated communication for admins and learners
notifyNewModule: Notify Learners when a new module is added to their journey
sendFollowUps: Send follow-ups when quizzes remain incomplete
alertOnFinish: Alerts learners when they finish a module or section
reminderFrequency: How often automated reminders should be sent
securitySettingsDesc: Controls session, password, and access security
inactivityTimeout: Users are logged out after this period of inactivity
failedAttempts: Accounts are temporarily locked after this number of failed attempts
passwordComplexity: Defines minimum complexity requirement for passwords
limitIPAccess: Limit platform access to approved corporate IP ranges
